wordGroup: means of livelihood 生活资料

sentences.en: The newcomers directly threaten the livelihood of the established workers.
sentences.cn: 新来的人直接威胁到原有工人的生计。

sentences.en: Predatory pricing by large supermarkets was threatening the livelihood of smaller businesses.
sentences.cn: 大型超市的掠夺性定价正威胁着小商店的生计。

sentences.en: It affords a livelihood to a great number of people.
sentences.cn: 这给许多人提供了生计。
